review_reason: forward_F and backward_P sorries require fundamentally new infrastructure (constructive Lindenbaum with F-formula persistence). Non-deterministic Zorn-based Lindenbaum cannot guarantee F-formula persistence across chain steps. See plan file Phase 3 progress section for detailed analysis of 6 attempted approaches and recommended resolution path.

artifacts.summary: Partial implementation: 2/4 sorries closed via GContent/HContent duality. Remaining 2 sorries (forward_F, backward_P) blocked by F-formula persistence problem requiring constructive Lindenbaum infrastructure.

partial_progress.details: Phase 3 blocked: forward_F and backward_P require F-formula persistence across Lindenbaum extensions. The existing non-deterministic Lindenbaum (via Zorn/Classical.choose) can kill F-obligations by adding G(neg psi). Resolution requires either constructive formula-by-formula Lindenbaum (15-20 hours) or a G-derivability independence metatheorem.

errors.message: forward_F requires F-formula persistence: F(psi) in M_n does not guarantee F(psi) in M_{n+1} because Lindenbaum can non-deterministically add G(neg psi). Once G(neg psi) enters, it propagates permanently via GContent, making the F-obligation unresolvable. Proving forward_F for the current chain construction is mathematically impossible without modifying the Lindenbaum extension.
errors.recommendation: Implement constructive formula-by-formula Lindenbaum that processes F(chi) before G(neg chi), combined with G-derivability independence metatheorem. Estimated 15-20 hours. Alternative: accept 2 remaining sorries as technical debt (status quo).

completion_data.completion_summary: Deep analysis of F/P witness obligation tracking reveals fundamental F-formula persistence problem in DovetailingChain.lean. The 2 cross-sign propagation sorries were closed in iteration 1 via GContent/HContent duality. The remaining 2 sorries (forward_F, backward_P) require constructive Lindenbaum infrastructure that does not yet exist. Six approaches were investigated and documented in the plan file.
